uvi.product_version: versions from v3.4 to before v4.9.288
uvi.description:
can: peak_pci: peak_pci_remove(): fix UAF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.288 by commit 447d44cd2f67a20b596ede3ca3cd67086dfd9ca9, it was introduced in version v3.4 by commit e6d9c80b7ca1504411ad6d7acdb8683e4ae1c9cd. For more details please see the references link.
